mapper.sql: sl.id as id, sl.sku_id as skuId, sl.location_id as locationId, sl.lifecycle as lifecycle, sl.modified_id as modifiedId, sl.last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, sl.ou_id as ouId, sku.name as skuName, sku.ext_code as skuCode, location.code as locationCode
mapper.select: select from t_wh_sku_location sl left join t_wh_sku sku on sku.id=sl.sku_id left join t_wh_location location on location.id=sl.location_id
select from t_wh_sku_location sl left join t_wh_sku sku on sku.id=sl.sku_id and sku.ou_id=sl.ou_id left join t_wh_location location on location.id=sl.location_id and sl.ou_id =location.ou_id

select (select sku.lifecycle from t_wh_sku sku where sku.id=#{skuId} and sku.ou_id=#{ouId}) as skuLifecycle, (select location.lifecycle from t_wh_location location where location.id=#{locationId} and location.ou_id=#{ouId}) as locationLifecycle, (select location.is_static from t_wh_location location where location.id=#{locationId} and location.ou_id=#{ouId}) as locationIsStatic, (select (case location.is_mix_stacking when 0 then 1 else IFNULL(location.mix_stacking_number,0) end) from t_wh_location location where location.id=#{locationId} and location.ou_id=#{ouId}) -(select count(1) from t_wh_sku_location sl where sl.location_id=#{locationId} and sl.ou_id=#{ouId} and sl.id!=#{id}) as availableMixCount, (select count(1) from t_wh_sku_location sl where sl.sku_id=#{skuId} and sl.location_id=#{locationId} and sl.ou_id=#{ouId} and sl.id!=#{id}) as skuLocationCount

select
from t_wh_sku_location where id = #{id} and ou_id=#{ouId}
mapper.delete: delete from t_wh_sku_location where id = #{id} and ou_id=#{ouId}
